.rts-container,
.rts-container-fluid {
  width: 100%;
  max-width: 1232px;
  margin: 0 auto;
}
.rts-container::after,
.rts-container-fluid::after {
  display: block;
  clear: both;
  content: "";
}

.rts-container-fluid {
  padding-left: 1em;
  padding-right: 1em;
}
@supports (padding: max(0px)) {
  .rts-container-fluid {
    padding-left: max(1em, env(safe-area-inset-left));
    padding-right: max(1em, env(safe-area-inset-right));
  }
}

.editorial-page .layout-page.default .rts-container {
  max-width: 992px;
}
@media (min-width: 1200px) {
  .editorial-page .layout-page.default .rts-container {
    max-width: 1232px;
  }
}

.align-left {
  text-align: left;
}

.align-center {
  text-align: center;
}

.align-right {
  text-align: right;
}

.align-justify {
  text-align: justify;
}

@media (max-width: 507.98px) {
  .hidden-phone {
    display: none !important;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 508px) and (max-width: 919.98px) {
  .hidden-tablet {
    display: none !important;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 920px) {
  .hidden-desktop {
    display: none !important;
  }
}
.rts-noscroll {
  position: fixed;
  width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.rts-noscroll #rts-ch-chatbot {
  display: none;
}

.rts-btn {
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
  position: relative;
  display: block;
  padding: 0.75em;
  margin: 1rem 0;
  font-family: inherit;
  font-size: 0.75em;
  font-weight: 500;
  text-align: center;
  cursor: pointer;
  background-color: transparent;
  border: 0;
  border-radius: 0.25rem;
}
.rts-btn .btn-text {
  display: none;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
.rts-btn .btn-picto {
  margin: 0.5em 0.75em 0.5em 0.25em;
  font-size: 1em;
}
@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .rts-btn.phone-up .btn-text {
    display: inline-block;
  }
  .rts-btn.phone-up .btn-picto {
    margin: 0 0 0 0.5em;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 700px) {
  .rts-btn {
    padding: 0.625rem 0.75rem;
  }
  .rts-btn .btn-text {
    display: inline-block;
  }
  .rts-btn .btn-picto {
    margin: 0 0 0 0.5em;
  }
}
.rts-btn.flat {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  font-size: 1em;
  font-weight: 400;
  color: #af001e;
}
.rts-btn.inline {
  display: inline-block;
}
.rts-btn.bordered {
  padding: 0.75em 1.25em;
  background-color: #fff;
  border: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
}
.rts-btn.bordered:hover {
  background-color: #f0f0f0;
}

  font-weight: 400;
  background-color: #f9f9f9;
  border: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
}
.rts-btn.light:hover {
  background-color: #ececec;
}

  padding: 0.75em 1.25em;
  background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
}

  font-weight: 500;

  background: #af001e;
}

  background-color: #e20027;
}

}
.rts-btn.accept:hover {
  background-color: #69993c;
}

  font-weight: 500;

}
.rts-btn.neutral:hover {
  background-color: #d5d5d5;
}

  margin: 0.25rem 0;

  .rts-btn.last-btn {
    margin: 1rem 0 0;
  }
}

  color: #dc2733;
  border: 1px solid #dc2733;
}

  visibility: hidden;
}

  position: absolute;
  top: 50%;

  width: 1em;

}

.marts-btn.add-to-playlist {
  display: inline-block;
  width: 1.5rem;

  padding: 0.25rem;

}

.rts-checkbox {
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
  position: relative;
  display: inline;
  width: 1em;
  height: 1em;
  font-size: 1.25em;
  vertical-align: middle;
  cursor: pointer;
}

.rts-checkbox input {
  position: absolute;
  cursor: pointer;
  opacity: 0;
}

.rts-checkbox .checkmark {
  position: absolute;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  width: 1em;
  height: 1em;
  background-color: #eee;
  border: 1px solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  border-radius: 0.125em;
}
.rts-checkbox .checkmark::after {
  position: absolute;
  display: none;
  content: "";
}

.rts-checkbox:hover input ~ .checkmark {
  background-color: #ccc;
}

.rts-checkbox input:checked ~ .checkmark {
  background-color: #2196f3;
}

.rts-checkbox input:disabled ~ .checkmark {
  background-color: #aaa !important;
}

.rts-checkbox input:checked ~ .checkmark::after {
  display: block;
}

.rts-checkbox .checkmark::after {
  top: 50%;
  left: 50%;
  width: 0.375em;
  height: 0.625em;
  margin-top: -0.1em;
  border: solid #fff;
  border-width: 0 0.125em 0.125em 0;
  -ms-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%) rotate(45deg);
  -webkit-transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%) rotate(45deg);
  transform: translateX(-50%) translateY(-50%) rotate(45deg);
}

.rts-checkbox + label {
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
  margin-left: 2em;
  vertical-align: middle;
}

.collapse-checkbox {
  display: none;
  touch-action: manipulation;
}
.collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .collapse {
  display: block !important;
}
.collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .collapse-flex {
  display: flex !important;
}

.collapse-checkbox ~ .collapse-nav .collapse-menu.more {
  display: block;
}
.collapse-checkbox ~ .collapse-nav .collapse-menu.less {
  display: none;
}

.collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .collapse-nav .collapse-menu.more {
  display: none;
}
.collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .collapse-nav .collapse-menu.less {
  display: block;
}

.collapse-label {
  display: block;
  touch-action: manipulation;
  cursor: pointer;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
}

.collapse-label.diff .opened {
  display: none;
}
.collapse-label.diff .closed {
  display: block;
}

.collapse-checkbox:checked ~ * .collapse-label.diff .opened {
  display: block;
}
.collapse-checkbox:checked ~ * .collapse-label.diff .closed {
  display: none;
}

.collapse,
.collapse-flex {
  display: none;
}

.expand .collapse {
  display: block;
}
.expand .collapse-flex {
  display: block;
  display: -webkit-flex;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
}
.expand .collapse-label {
  display: none;
}

@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .expand-phone .collapse {
    display: block;
  }
  .expand-phone .collapse-flex {
    display: block;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
  }
  .expand-phone .collapse-label {
    display: none;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 700px) {
  .expand-tablet .collapse {
    display: block;
  }
  .expand-tablet .collapse-flex {
    display: block;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
  }
  .expand-tablet .collapse-label {
    display: none;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 920px) {
  .expand-tablet-landscape .collapse {
    display: block;
  }
  .expand-tablet-landscape .collapse-flex {
    display: block;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
  }
  .expand-tablet-landscape .collapse-label {
    display: none;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 1200px) {
  .expand-desktop .collapse {
    display: block;
  }
  .expand-desktop .collapse-flex {
    display: block;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
  }
  .expand-desktop .collapse-label {
    display: none;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 1232px) {
  .expand-fluid .collapse {
    display: block;
  }
  .expand-fluid .collapse-flex {
    display: block;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
  }
  .expand-fluid .collapse-label {
    display: none;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 1800px) {
  .expand-big-screen .collapse {
    display: block;
  }
  .expand-big-screen .collapse-flex {
    display: block;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
  }
  .expand-big-screen .collapse-label {
    display: none;
  }
}

.rts-dropdown-menu {
  margin-left: 1em;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu .rts-dropdown-item {
  display: table;
  width: 100%;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu .rts-dropdown-link {
  display: table-cell;
  height: 2.5em;
  padding: 0.25em 0;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu .rts-dropdown-title {
  display: inline-block;
  line-height: 1.125em;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu .rts-dropdown-picto {
  width: 2em;
  height: 2em;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .rts-dropdown-menu {
    position: absolute;
    top: 100%;
    left: -0.5em;
    z-index: 1001;
    display: none;
    min-width: 18em;
    max-width: 20em;
    padding: 0.5em;
    margin: 0;
    color: #000;
    background-color: #fff;
    box-shadow: 0 2px 2px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.4);
  }
  .rts-dropdown-menu.menu-al-br {
    top: 100%;
    right: -0.5em;
    bottom: auto;
    left: auto;
  }
  .rts-dropdown-menu.menu-al-tr {
    top: auto;
    right: -0.5em;
    bottom: 100%;
    left: auto;
  }
  .rts-dropdown-menu.menu-al-tl {
    top: auto;
    right: auto;
    bottom: 100%;
    left: -0.5em;
  }
  .rts-dropdown-menu .rts-dropdown-title {
    padding-right: 0.5em;
    padding-left: 0.5em;
  }
}

.rts-dropdown-menu.dark {
  color: #fff;
  background-color: #333;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark .rts-dropdown-item {
  border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4);
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark .rts-dropdown-item:last-child:not(:first-child) {
  border-bottom: 0;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark .rts-dropdown-title {
  font-family: "Gotham Narrow SSm A", "Gotham Narrow SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-size: 1em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}
@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .rts-dropdown-menu.dark .rts-dropdown-item:hover {
    color: #fff;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  }
  .rts-dropdown-menu.dark .rts-dropdown-title {
    font-size: 0.875em;
  }
}

.rts-dropdown-menu.light {
  color: #000;
  background-color: #fff;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.light .rts-dropdown-item {
  border-bottom: 1px solid #f5f5f5;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.light .rts-dropdown-item:last-child {
  border-bottom: 0;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.light .rts-dropdown-title {
  font-family: "Gotham SSm A", "Gotham SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.8125em;
  font-weight: 500;
  line-height: 1.375em;
  color: inherit;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

  .rts-dropdown-menu.light .rts-dropdown-item:hover {
    color: #000;
    background-color: #f5f5f5;
  }
}

.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common {
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  background: none;
  box-shadow: none;
  border: 0.24em solid rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  border-top: none;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .rts-dropdown-item, .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item {
  border: none;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common &gt; .rts-dropdown-item, .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item {
  display: block;
  width: auto;
  background: #343434;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common &gt; .rts-dropdown-item.subnav, .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item.subnav {
  background: #000;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common &gt; .resizable-hidden-item &gt; .rts-dropdown-item.highlight {
  background: #db2e33 url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/menu/arrow-highlight-white.svg") no-repeat;
  background-position: 0.688em 1.313em;
  background-size: 0.875em;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common &gt; .resizable-hidden-item &gt; .rts-dropdown-item.highlight .rts-dropdown-link {
  border-color: #db2e33;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common &gt; .resizable-hidden-item &gt; .rts-dropdown-item.home {
  background: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/menu/home-white.svg") no-repeat;
  background-position: 0.688em 1.25em;
  background-size: 0.875em;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .rts-dropdown-link {
  display: block;
  height: auto;
  padding: 0.625em;
  margin: 0 1.25em;
  line-height: 1.875em;
  border-top: 1px solid #1f1f1f;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .rts-dropdown-picto {
  display: none;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .rts-dropdown-title {
  padding: 0;
  font-family: "Gotham SSm A", "Gotham SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.75em;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 1.667em;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common &gt; *:first-child .rts-dropdown-link {
  border-top: none;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common &gt; .rts-dropdown-item:not(.highlight):hover {
  background: #000;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common &gt; .rts-dropdown-item:not(.highlight):hover .rts-dropdown-link {
  border-color: #000;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common &gt; .rts-dropdown-item:not(.highlight):hover + .rts-dropdown-item .rts-dropdown-link {
  border-color: #343434;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item:hover, .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item:hover .collapse-checkbox ~ .collapse-label {
  background-color: #000;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item:hover + .resizable-hidden-item &gt; .rts-dropdown-item:not(.highlight) &gt; .rts-dropdown-link, .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item:hover + .resizable-hidden-item &gt; .rts-nav-link &gt; .rts-nav-title {
  border-color: #343434;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .collapse-checkbox ~ .resizable-hidden-subitems &gt; .rts-dropdown-item {
  display: none;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .resizable-hidden-subitems &gt; .rts-dropdown-item {
  display: block;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .rts-nav-link {
  background-color: #000;
  background-image: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/menu/minus-less-white.svg");
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link {
  padding: 0;
  background: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/menu/plus-more-white.svg") no-repeat right;
  background-position-x: 93%;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link::after {
  content: none;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link .rts-nav-title {
  display: block;
  padding: 0.875em;
  margin: 0 1.667em;
  line-height: 2.5em;
  border-top: 1px solid #000;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link + .resizable-hidden-subitems {
  padding: 0;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link + .resizable-hidden-subitems .rts-dropdown-item {
  background: #fff;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link + .resizable-hidden-subitems .rts-dropdown-item .rts-dropdown-link {
  padding: 0.625em 0.625em 0.625em 1.875em;
  margin: 0 1.25em;
  background: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/menu/menu-separator-bullet.svg") no-repeat 0.75em center;
  background-size: 0.438em;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link + .resizable-hidden-subitems .rts-dropdown-item .rts-dropdown-title {
  color: #000;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link + .resizable-hidden-subitems .rts-dropdown-item:first-child {
  border-top: 3px solid #d1d1d1;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link + .resizable-hidden-subitems .rts-dropdown-item:first-child .rts-dropdown-link {
  border-top: 0;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link + .resizable-hidden-subitems .rts-dropdown-item:not(:first-child) .rts-dropdown-link {
  border-top: 1px solid #d1d1d1;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link + .resizable-hidden-subitems .rts-dropdown-item:hover {
  background: #555;
  border-color: #555;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link + .resizable-hidden-subitems .rts-dropdown-item:hover .rts-dropdown-link {
  border-color: #555;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link + .resizable-hidden-subitems .rts-dropdown-item:hover .rts-dropdown-title {
  color: #fff;
}
.rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .resizable-hidden-item .rts-nav-link + .resizable-hidden-subitems .rts-dropdown-item:hover + .rts-dropdown-item .rts-dropdown-link {
  border-color: #fff;
}
@media (max-width: 508px) {
  .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common {
    border: 0;
  }
  .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .rts-dropdown-item {
    background: #fff;
  }
  .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .rts-dropdown-link {
    padding-left: 1.875em;
    margin: 0;
    background: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/menu/menu-separator-bullet.svg") no-repeat 0.75em center;
    background-size: 0.438em;
    border-color: #d1d1d1;
  }
  .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .rts-dropdown-title {
    color: #000;
  }
  .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common &gt; *:first-child .rts-dropdown-link {
    border-top: 0.188em solid #d1d1d1;
  }
  .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .rts-dropdown-item:hover {
    background: #fff;
  }
  .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .rts-dropdown-item:hover .rts-dropdown-link, .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .rts-dropdown-item:hover + .rts-dropdown-item .rts-dropdown-link {
    border-color: #d1d1d1;
  }
  .rts-dropdown-menu.dark.common .rts-dropdown-item:hover .rts-dropdown-title {
    text-decoration: underline;
  }
}

.inline-search-form {
  width: 100%;
  font-size: 1em;
  white-space: nowrap;
}
.inline-search-form .navbar-search-submit {
  font-size: 1em;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
.inline-search-form .navbar-search {
  width: 100%;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  vertical-align: middle;
  background-color: transparent;
  border: 0;
  -webkit-appearance: initial;
}
.inline-search-form .navbar-search:focus {
  outline: 0;
}
.inline-search-form .navbar-search::-webkit-input-placeholder {
  line-height: 1.2;
  font-family: inherit;
  color: inherit;
}
.inline-search-form .navbar-search::-moz-placeholder {
  font-family: inherit;
  color: inherit;
}
.inline-search-form .navbar-search:-ms-input-placeholder {
  font-family: inherit;
  color: inherit;
}
.inline-search-form .navbar-search-submit + .navbar-search {
  width: calc(100% - 2.5em);
  margin-left: 0.5em;
}

.inline-search-form.dark {
  padding: 0.25em 0.75em;
  margin-bottom: 1em;
  font-size: 1em;
  background-color: #4d4d4d;
  border-radius: 2em;
}
.inline-search-form.dark .navbar-search {
  height: 2em;
  font-family: "Gotham Narrow SSm A", "Gotham Narrow SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-size: 1.15em;
  color: #fff;
}
.inline-search-form.dark .navbar-search::-webkit-input-placeholder {
  line-height: 1.2;
  color: #bbb;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}
.inline-search-form.dark .navbar-search::-moz-placeholder {
  color: #bbb;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}
.inline-search-form.dark .navbar-search:-ms-input-placeholder {
  color: #bbb;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}
.inline-search-form.dark .rts-picto.form.search {
  font-size: 1.15em;
  background-image: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/forms/icone_search-white.svg");
}
@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .inline-search-form.dark {
    margin-bottom: 0;
  }
  .inline-search-form.dark .navbar-search {
    height: 1.5em;
    font-size: 0.875em;
  }
}

.inline-search-form.light {
  padding: 0.25em 0.5em;
  margin-bottom: 1em;
  font-size: 1em;
  background-color: #fff;
  border: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
  border-radius: 0.25rem;
}
.inline-search-form.light .navbar-search {
  height: 1.75em;
  font-family: "Gotham SSm A", "Gotham SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-size: 1em;
  color: #000;
}
.inline-search-form.light .navbar-search::-webkit-input-placeholder {
  line-height: 1.2;
  color: #999;
}
.inline-search-form.light .navbar-search::-moz-placeholder {
  color: #999;
}
.inline-search-form.light .navbar-search:-ms-input-placeholder {
  color: #999;
}
@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .inline-search-form.light {
    margin-bottom: 0;
  }
  .inline-search-form.light .navbar-search {
    height: 1.75em;
    font-size: 0.875em;
  }
}

.inline-search-form.inline-page {
  padding: 0.25em 0.5em;
  margin-bottom: 2em;
  font-size: 1em;
  background-color: #fff;
  border: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
  border-radius: 0.25rem;
}
.inline-search-form.inline-page .navbar-search {
  height: 1.75em;
  font-family: "Gotham SSm A", "Gotham SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-size: 1em;
  color: #000;
}
.inline-search-form.inline-page .navbar-search::-webkit-input-placeholder {
  line-height: 1.2;
  color: #999;
}
.inline-search-form.inline-page .navbar-search::-moz-placeholder {
  color: #999;
}
.inline-search-form.inline-page .navbar-search:-ms-input-placeholder {
  color: #999;
}
@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .inline-search-form.inline-page .navbar-search {
    height: 1.75em;
    font-size: 0.875em;
  }
}

  width: 270px;

}

  background-color: #f4f4f4;
}

.rts .datepicker--nav-title {
  font-weight: 500;
}

  font-size: 0.9rem;
  font-weight: 500;
  color: #dc143c !important;
}

.rts .-current- {
  color: #af001e !important;
}

.rts .-selected- {
  color: #fff !important;
  background-color: #af001e !important;
}

  color: #dc143c;
}

  background-color: #eacbcb;
  border-color: #dc143c !important;
}

  color: #dc143c;
}

  display: inline-block;
  width: auto;
  margin: 0 0.5rem 0 0;

}

}

  display: none;
}

.rts-navbar {
  width: 100%;
  background-color: transparent;
  display: block;
  display: -webkit-flex;
  display: -ms-flexbox;
  display: flex;
  -ms-flex-direction: column;
  -webkit-flex-direction: column;
  flex-direction: column;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-brand {
  display: none;
  float: none;
  height: auto;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0 0.25em 0 0;
  font-size: 1em;
  line-height: 1;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-brand .rts-logo {
  display: block;
  font-size: 3em;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav {
  float: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  list-style: none;
  -ms-flex-positive: 1;
  -ms-flex-negative: 1;
  -webkit-flex: 1 1 auto;
  -ms-flex: 1 1 auto;
  flex: 1 1 auto;
  max-width: none;
  -ms-flex-order: 3;
  -webkit-order: 3;
  order: 3;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav::after {
  display: block;
  clear: both;
  content: "";
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-actions {
  -ms-flex-positive: 0;
  -ms-flex-negative: 0;
  -webkit-flex: 0 0 auto;
  -ms-flex: 0 0 auto;
  flex: 0 0 auto;
  max-width: none;
  -ms-flex-order: 2;
  -webkit-order: 2;
  order: 2;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-info {
  display: block;
  padding: 2em 0 1em;
  -ms-flex-order: 4;
  -webkit-order: 4;
  order: 4;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-info .navbar-info-title {
  margin-bottom: 1em;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-info .rts-picto.social {
  font-size: 2.5em;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-nav-item {
  position: relative;
  float: none;
  margin-top: 0;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-nav-item.subnav .rts-nav-link::after {
  display: inline-block;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  margin-bottom: 0.15em;
  margin-left: 0.2125em;
  vertical-align: baseline;
  content: "";
  border-top: 0.25em solid;
  border-right: 0.25em solid transparent;
  border-bottom: 0;
  border-left: 0.25em solid transparent;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-nav-item.subnav .rts-nav-link:empty::after {
  margin-left: 0;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-nav-link {
  display: block;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 0.75em 0;
  margin: 0;
  line-height: 1;
  color: inherit;
  cursor: pointer;
}
@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .rts-navbar {
    display: block;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    -ms-flex-direction: row;
    -webkit-flex-direction: row;
    flex-direction: row;
    -ms-flex-align: center;
    -webkit-align-items: center;
    align-items: center;
    -ms-flex-line-pack: distribute;
    -webkit-align-content: space-around;
    align-content: space-around;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav {
    width: auto;
    cursor: default;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-brand {
    display: inline-block;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-actions {
    -ms-flex-order: 4;
    -webkit-order: 4;
    order: 4;
    width: 10em;
    min-width: 10em;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-info {
    display: none;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-nav-item {
    display: inline-block;
    width: auto;
    margin: 0 4px;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-nav-item:hover .rts-dropdown-menu {
    display: table;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 920px) {
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-actions {
    width: 13em;
    min-width: 13em;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 1232px) {
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-actions {
    width: 16em;
    min-width: 16em;
  }
}

.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.dark .rts-nav-item,
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.dark .rts-nav-item:last-child {
  border-top: 1px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.4);
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.dark .rts-nav-item {
  margin: 0 3px;
  color: #fff;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.dark .rts-nav-title {
  font-family: "Gotham Narrow SSm A", "Gotham Narrow SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-size: 1em;
  font-weight: 400;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}
@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.dark .rts-nav-item,
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.dark .rts-nav-item:last-child {
    border: 0;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.dark .rts-nav-item:not(:first-child)::before {
    opacity: 0.5;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.dark .rts-nav-item:hover {
    color: #fff;
    background-color: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.8);
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.dark .rts-nav-link {
    padding: 0.75em;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.dark .rts-nav-title {
    font-size: 0.875em;
  }
}

.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light .rts-nav-item,
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light .rts-nav-item:last-child {
  border-top: 1px solid #f5f5f5;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light .rts-nav-title {
  font-family: "Gotham SSm A", "Gotham SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.8125em;
  font-weight: 500;
  line-height: 1.375em;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}
@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light .rts-nav-item,
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light .rts-nav-item:last-child {
    border: 0;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light .rts-nav-item {
    margin: 0 28px 0 0;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.bullet .rts-nav-item {
    margin: 0 22px 0 24px;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.bullet .rts-nav-item:first-child {
    padding-left: 0;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light .rts-nav-link {
    padding: 0.5em 0;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light .rts-nav-title {
    line-height: 1;
  }
}

.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-title,
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-link .menu.burger::before {
  font-size: 0.75em;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-item:first-child {
  margin-left: 0;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet &gt; .rts-nav-item &gt; .rts-nav-link {
  padding: 0;
  line-height: 3.125em;
  cursor: pointer;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet &gt; .rts-nav-item &gt; .rts-nav-link::after {
  width: auto;
  height: auto;
  margin: 0 0 0.125em 0.25em;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-link .menu.burger {
  width: 2.125em;
  height: auto;
  background: none;
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-link .menu.burger::before {
  font-family: "Gotham SSm A", "Gotham SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-weight: 500;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  content: "plus";
}
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-item:hover &gt; .rts-nav-link,
.rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-item:hover &gt; .rts-nav-link .menu.burger::before {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-item.home .rts-nav-link {
    padding-left: 1.125em;
    background: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/menu/home-black.svg") no-repeat;
    background-position: 0 50%;
    background-size: 0.75em;
  }

    margin: 0 1em;
  }

    color: #fff;
    line-height: 10px;

  }

    text-decoration: none;
    background-color: #bc272c;
  }
}

    margin: 0;
  }

    background-size: 0.875em;
  }

    background-position: 0.688em 1.25em;
    background-size: 0.875em;
  }

    display: block;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-item {
    background: #343434;
    border-top: 1px solid #1f1f1f;
    border-bottom: 0;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-item:first-child {
    border-top: 0;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet &gt; .rts-nav-item &gt; .rts-nav-link {
    display: block;
    height: auto;
    padding: 0.625em 2.125em;
    line-height: 1.875em;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    background: none;
    border-top: 0;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-title {
    font-family: "Gotham SSm A", "Gotham SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
    font-size: 0.75em;
    font-weight: 400;
    color: #fff;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet &gt; .rts-nav-item.subnav &gt; .rts-nav-link {
    background: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/menu/plus-more-white.svg") no-repeat right;
    background-position-x: 93%;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet &gt; .rts-nav-item.subnav &gt; .rts-nav-link::after {
    border: 0;
  }
}
@media (max-width: 508px) {
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-item.subnav &gt; .collapse-label {
    pointer-events: auto;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-item.subnav &gt; .rts-dropdown-menu &gt; .rts-dropdown-item {
    display: none;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-item.subnav .collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .rts-dropdown-menu &gt; .rts-dropdown-item {
    display: block;
  }
  .rts-navbar .rts-navbar-nav.light.common.bullet .rts-nav-item.subnav .collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .rts-nav-link {
    background-color: #000;
    background-image: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/menu/minus-less-white.svg");
  }
}

    min-width: 13.5em;

  }
}

  }
}

  display: none !important;
}

  display: none !important;
}

  display: none !important;
}

  display: none !important;
}

  display: none !important;
}

  display: none !important;
}

  display: none !important;
}

  display: none !important;
}
.rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .rts-nav-item.nvl-9:not(.resized-hidden) ~ .resizable-hidden-items .nvl-9 {
  display: none !important;
}
.rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .rts-nav-item.nvl-10:not(.resized-hidden) ~ .resizable-hidden-items .nvl-10 {
  display: none !important;
}
.rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .rts-nav-item.nvl-11:not(.resized-hidden) ~ .resizable-hidden-items .nvl-11 {
  display: none !important;
}
.rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .rts-nav-item.nvl-12:not(.resized-hidden) ~ .resizable-hidden-items .nvl-12 {
  display: none !important;
}
.rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .rts-nav-item.nvl-13:not(.resized-hidden) ~ .resizable-hidden-items .nvl-13 {
  display: none !important;
}
.rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .rts-nav-item.nvl-14:not(.resized-hidden) ~ .resizable-hidden-items .nvl-14 {
  display: none !important;
}
.rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .rts-nav-item.nvl-15:not(.resized-hidden) ~ .resizable-hidden-items .nvl-15 {
  display: none !important;
}
.rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .resizable-hidden-items {
  display: none;
}
.rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .resizable-hidden-subitems {
  padding-left: 1em;
}
@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .resized-hidden {
    display: none;
  }
  .rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .resizable-hidden-items.has-items {
    display: inline-block;
    margin-right: 0;
    visibility: hidden;
  }
  .rts-navbar-nav:not(.bullet) .rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .resizable-hidden-items.has-items {
    margin: 0 !important;
  }
  .rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .resizable-hidden-items.has-items {
    visibility: visible;
  }
}

.rts-navbar.resizable-navbar .rts-navbar-nav {
  width: 100%;
  overflow: hidden;
  white-space: nowrap;
}

.rts-navbar.resizable-navbar.computed .rts-navbar-nav {
  overflow: visible;
  white-space: normal;
}

@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .rts-navbar.resizable-navbar.computing .resized-hidden {
    display: inline-block;
    visibility: hidden;
  }
  .rts-navbar.resizable-navbar.computing .resizable-hidden-items,
.rts-navbar.resizable-navbar.computing .resizable-hidden-items.resized-hidden {
    display: inline-block;
    visibility: hidden;
  }
}
.rts-header {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1035;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  width: 100%;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  font-family: "Gotham SSm A", "Gotham SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 1;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: subpixel-antialiased;
}
.rts-header *,
.rts-header *::before,
.rts-header *::after {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
.rts-header a, .rts-header a:hover, .rts-header a:visited {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration: none;
}
.rts-header input {
  border: 0;
}
.rts-header ul, .rts-header li {
  font-size: 1em;
}

.rts-header.transversal {
  float: none !important;
  width: 100% !important;
  color: #fff;
  background-color: #333;
}

.rts-header.site {
  color: #000;
  background-color: #fff;
}

.rts-topbar {
  padding-left: 1em;
  padding-right: 1em;
  display: table;
  width: 100%;
  min-height: 2.25em;
  font-family: "Gotham Narrow SSm A", "Gotham Narrow SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-size: 1em;
  color: #fff;
  table-layout: fixed;
  background-color: #333;
}
@supports (padding: max(0px)) {
  .rts-topbar {
    padding-left: max(1em, env(safe-area-inset-left));
    padding-right: max(1em, env(safe-area-inset-right));
  }
}
.rts-topbar .topbar-part {
  display: table-cell;
  width: 33%;
  height: 2.25em;
  vertical-align: middle;
}
.rts-topbar .topbar-social,
.rts-topbar .topbar-about {
  display: none;
  font-size: 0.8125em;
  font-weight: 200;
}
.rts-topbar .topbar-about a + a {
  margin-left: 0.625rem;
}
.rts-topbar .topbar-about a + a::before {
  margin-right: 0.625rem;
  content: "|";
}
.rts-topbar .topbar-brand {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 0.5em 0;
}
.rts-topbar .topbar-brand .rts-logo {
  display: block;
  font-size: 2em;
}
.rts-topbar .topbar-text {
  vertical-align: middle;
}
@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .rts-topbar {
    color: #b0b0b0;
    background-color: #111;
  }
  .rts-topbar a:hover {
    color: #cacaca;
  }
  .rts-topbar .topbar-part {
    width: auto;
  }
  .rts-topbar .topbar-part.align-left {
    width: 20%;
  }
  .rts-topbar .topbar-part.align-center {
    display: none;
  }
  .rts-topbar .topbar-about {
    display: inline-block;
  }
  .rts-topbar .topbar-brand {
    display: none;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 920px) {
  .rts-topbar .topbar-social {
    display: inline-block;
    margin: 0 0.75rem 0 0;
  }
}

.rts-menu {
  font-size: 0.9em;
}
.rts-menu .menu-collapse-wrapper {
  display: inline-block;
  padding: 1.15em 0;
}
.rts-menu .collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .menu-collapse-wrapper {
  display: block;
  padding-bottom: 1em;
  margin-bottom: 1em;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #f5f5f5;
}
@media (min-width: 508px) {
  .rts-menu {
    display: block;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
    padding: 0.5em 0;
  }
  .rts-menu .menu-collapse-wrapper,
.rts-menu .collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .menu-collapse-wrapper {
    display: none;
  }
}

.rts-menu.dark {
  color: #fff;
  background-color: #333;
}

.rts-menu.light {
  color: #000;
  background-color: #fff;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #d8d8d8;
}

.rts-menu.light.common {
  padding: 0;
  font-size: 1em;
  border-top: 0;
}
.rts-menu.light.common .menu-collapse-wrapper &gt; .collapse-label .rts-picto {
  display: none;
}
.rts-menu.light.common .menu-collapse-wrapper &gt; .collapse-label .label {
  padding: 0 0.75em 0 0;
  font-size: 0.75em;
  font-weight: 500;
  text-transform: uppercase;
  background: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/menu/arrow-up-black.svg") no-repeat right center;
}
.rts-menu.light.common .collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .menu-collapse-wrapper {
  margin-bottom: 0;
}
.rts-menu.light.common .collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .menu-collapse-wrapper &gt; .collapse-label .label {
  display: none;
}
.rts-menu.light.common .collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .menu-collapse-wrapper &gt; .collapse-label::after {
  content: "fermer";
  text-transform: uppercase;
  font-size: 0.75em;
  font-weight: 500;
  padding: 0 0 0 1.25em;
  background: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/menu/cross-close-black.svg") no-repeat left center;
  background-size: 0.875em;
}
@media (max-width: 508px) {
  .rts-menu.light.common {
    border-top: 0;
  }
  .rts-menu.light.common .rts-container-fluid {
    padding: 0;
  }
  .rts-menu.light.common .menu-collapse-wrapper {
    padding: 0;
    line-height: 3.125em;
  }
  .rts-menu.light.common .menu-collapse-wrapper &gt; .collapse-label {
    margin: 0 0.625em;
  }
  .rts-menu.light.common .rts-navbar-actions {
    padding-right: 1em;
    padding-left: 1em;
    margin-top: 1em;
  }
}

.entreprise-collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .rts-entreprise-header {
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  z-index: 5000;
  width: 100vw;
  height: 100vh;
  background: #fff;
}
.entreprise-collapse-checkbox:checked ~ .rts-entreprise-header .collapse-flex {
  display: flex;
}

.rts-entreprise-header .rts-navbar .rts-nav-item {
  margin: 0 18px;
}
.rts-entreprise-header .rts-navbar .rts-nav-item:last-of-type {
  margin-right: 0;
}
.rts-entreprise-header .rts-navbar .rts-nav-item.selected .rts-nav-title {
  padding-bottom: 0.3125rem;
  border-bottom: 0.125rem solid #edc218;
}
.rts-entreprise-header .rts-navbar .rts-nav-link {
  padding: 1.25em 0;
  text-align: center;
}
.rts-entreprise-header .rts-navbar .rts-nav-title {
  font-size: 0.8125rem;
  font-weight: 700;
  text-transform: uppercase;
}

  .rts-entreprise-header .menu-collapse-wrapper {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: space-between;
    height: 50px;
  }

    font-size: 1.75em;
  }

    padding: 1em;
    margin-right: -1em;
  }

    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: calc(50% - 25px);
    width: 50px;
    content: "";
    border-bottom: 1px solid #f1f1f1;
  }
}

    display: none;

    text-align: center;
  }

    box-shadow: 0 2em 3em -0.5em rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
  }
  .rts-entreprise-header .rts-dropdown-item {
    position: relative;
    padding: 0 2em;
  }
  .rts-entreprise-header .rts-dropdown-item.selected .rts-dropdown-title {
    padding-bottom: 0.3125rem;
    border-bottom: 0.125rem solid #edc218;
  }

    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 2em;
    width: 65px;
    content: "";
    border-bottom: 1px solid #f1f1f1;
  }
  .rts-entreprise-header .rts-dropdown-title {
    font-size: 0.6875em;
    font-weight: 700;
    color: #212121;
    text-transform: uppercase;
  }
}

  background-color: #fff;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-position: 50%;
  background-size: cover;
}

  display: table-cell;
  width: 100%;

  line-height: 0;
  text-align: center;
  vertical-align: middle;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: 100%;

  background-size: cover;

  display: none;

  }

.rts-login-button {
  position: relative;
  display: none;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  font-family: "Gotham Narrow SSm A", "Gotham Narrow SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  white-space: nowrap;
  cursor: pointer;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  background-size: contain;
  -webkit-user-select: none;
  -moz-user-select: none;
  -ms-user-select: none;
  user-select: none;
}
.rts-login-button.user, .rts-login-button.connect {
  display: inline-block;
  display: -webkit-inline-flex;
  display: -ms-inline-flexbox;
  display: inline-flex;
  -ms-flex-direction: row;
  -webkit-flex-direction: row;
  flex-direction: row;
  -ms-flex-align: center;
  -webkit-align-items: center;
  align-items: center;
}
.rts-login-button .rts-login-button-name {
  pointer-events: none;
}

.rts-login-button.topbar {
  width: 3.5em;
  height: 3em;
  margin-left: -1em;
  background-position-x: 1em;
  background-position-y: 50%;
  background-size: 25px 25px;
}
.rts-login-button.topbar .rts-login-button-name {
  display: none;
}
.rts-login-button.topbar .rts-user-panel {
  box-shadow: 1em 1em 1em 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}
.rts-login-button.topbar.user {
  background-image: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/marts/picto-login-user-topbar.svg");
}
.rts-login-button.topbar.connect {
  background-image: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/marts/picto-login-connect-topbar.svg");
}

  .rts-login-button.topbar {
    width: auto;
    height: 2.2em;
    padding: 0 1em 0 3em;
  }

    color: #3f3f3f;
    background-color: #eee;
  }

  }
  .rts-login-button.topbar.connect:hover {
    background-image: url("/hummingbird-static/images/pictos/marts/picto-login-connect-topbar-hover.svg");
  }
  .rts-login-button.topbar.user {
    min-width: 14em;
  }
  .rts-login-button.topbar .rts-login-button-name {
    display: block;
    font-size: 0.8125em;
  }
}

.rts-user-panel {
  position: absolute;
  top: 100%;
  left: 0;
  z-index: 1060;
  display: none;
  min-width: 14em;
  padding: 1em;
  color: #3f3f3f;
  background-color: #fff;
  box-shadow: 0 0 1.25em 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
}

  width: 100%;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  list-style: none;
}

  padding-top: 0.75em;
  margin-top: 0.75em;
  border-top: 1px solid #c0c0c0;
}

  padding-bottom: 0.75em;
  border-bottom: 1px solid #c0c0c0;
}

  margin: 0;
  white-space: normal;
}
.rts-user-panel .marts-up-item + .marts-up-item {
  margin: 0.75em 0 0;
}
.rts-user-panel .marts-up-link {
  display: block;
  padding: 0;
  font-family: "Gotham Narrow SSm A", "Gotham Narrow SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-size: 0.875em;
  line-height: 1.125em;
  color: #3f3f3f;
  text-decoration: none;
}

  color: #af001e;
}

  display: block;
  margin: 0.25em 0 0;
  font-size: 0.75em;
  font-weight: 300;
  line-height: 1.125em;
  color: #666;
}

}

.rts-cookie-warning {
  position: relative;
  z-index: 1035;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  padding: 0;
  margin: 0;
  font-family: "Gotham SSm A", "Gotham SSm B", "SRGSSR", "SRGSSRType_Text_Rg", "Helvetica", "Arial", "Verdana", sans-serif;
  font-size: 16px;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 1;
  -webkit-font-smoothing: subpixel-antialiased;
}
.rts-cookie-warning *,
.rts-cookie-warning *::before,
.rts-cookie-warning *::after {
  box-sizing: border-box;
}
.rts-cookie-warning a {
  color: #af001e;
  text-decoration: none;
}
.rts-cookie-warning a:hover, .rts-cookie-warning a:visited {
  color: #af001e;
}
.rts-cookie-warning a:hover {
  text-decoration: underline;
}
.rts-cookie-warning b {
  font-weight: 500;
}
.rts-cookie-warning li + li {
  margin-top: 0.5em;
}
.rts-cookie-warning p {
  font-size: 1em;
  font-style: normal;
  font-weight: 400;
  line-height: 1.25em;
}

.rts-cookie-warning-container {
  display: block;
  min-height: 8.5em;
  padding: 1.5em 0;
  color: #000;
  background-color: #f5f5f5;
  border-bottom: 0.0625em solid #d8d8d8;
}

.rts-container {
  padding-left: 1em;
  padding-right: 1em;
}
@supports (padding: max(0px)) {
  .rts-container {
    padding-left: max(1em, env(safe-area-inset-left));
    padding-right: max(1em, env(safe-area-inset-right));
  }
}

.rts-cookie-warning-actions .rts-btn {
  padding: 1em;
  margin: 1.25em 0;
  font-size: 0.875em;
}

.rts-cookie-warning[data-widget-source=play] {
  font-size: 18px;
}
.rts-cookie-warning[data-widget-source=play] .rts-container {
  max-width: 1276px;
}

.rts-cookie-warning-text {
  margin: 0 0 1.5em;
  font-size: 1em;
  line-height: 1.25em;
}
.rts-cookie-warning-text .cookie-warning-title {
  font-size: 1.2em;
  font-weight: 500;
}
.rts-cookie-warning-text p + p {
  margin-top: 1em;
}
@media (min-width: 700px) {
  .rts-cookie-warning-text {
    font-size: 0.875em;
  }
}

.rts-cookie-warning-actions {
  font-size: 0.875em;
}

.rts-cookie-warning-message,
.rts-cookie-warning-details {
  display: none;
}

.rts-cookie-warning-details .cookie-warning-options {
  padding: 0;
  margin: 1em 0;
  list-style: none;
}

.cookie-panel-collapse {
  display: none;
}
.cookie-panel-collapse:not(:checked) ~ .rts-cookie-warning-message, .cookie-panel-collapse:checked ~ .rts-cookie-warning-details {
  display: block;
}

@media (min-width: 700px) {
  .rts-cookie-warning-container {
    padding: 1.5em 0;
  }

  .cookie-panel-collapse:not(:checked) ~ .rts-cookie-warning-message, .cookie-panel-collapse:checked ~ .rts-cookie-warning-details {
    display: block;
    display: -webkit-flex;
    display: -ms-flexbox;
    display: flex;
  }

  .rts-cookie-warning-text {
    -ms-flex-positive: 1;
    -ms-flex-negative: 1;
    -webkit-flex: 1 1 auto;
    -ms-flex: 1 1 auto;
    flex: 1 1 auto;
    max-width: none;
    -webkit-align-self: center;
    align-self: center;
    -ms-flex-item-align: center;
    margin: 0 1.5em 0 0;
  }

  .rts-cookie-warning-actions {
    -ms-flex-positive: 0;
    -ms-flex-negative: 0;
    -webkit-flex: 0 0 12em;
    -ms-flex: 0 0 12em;
    flex: 0 0 12em;
    max-width: 12em;
  }
}
@media (min-width: 920px) {
  .rts-cookie-warning-actions {
    -ms-flex-positive: 0;
    -ms-flex-negative: 0;
    -webkit-flex: 0 0 18em;
    -ms-flex: 0 0 18em;
    flex: 0 0 18em;
    max-width: 18em;
  }
}
._st::after {
  display: block;
  clear: both;
  content: "";
}

  display: none !important;
}

  padding-top: 1em;
  background: #222;
}
.rts-nativeapp.rts-sport-header ~ ._st .container.page-mode-multiangle {
  pointer-events: none;
  visibility: visible;
}

  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  left: 0;
  z-index: -1;
  height: 100vh;
  content: "";
  background: #222;
}

  padding-top: 8em;
}
